document_data.name: Jula Bingle
document_data.mainbody: '''Jula Bingle''' was a [[gnome]] [[alchemist]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{DDO-MoMDtime}}
document_data.Description: Jula had blue-gray hair styled in a side cut, short on one side and long on the other.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1374}}, Jula joined the [[Elves of Cormanthor]] at their [[Myth Drannor outskirts camp|base camp]] at the ruins of [[Myth Drannor]]. She served as a trainer for fans of [[alchemy]] at the camp.
